welcome_message_body: Welcome to Koga, Japan! Known for its rich history, beautiful temples, and traditional tea houses, we invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of our city during your visit.

restaurants.name: ヒライ
restaurants.description: ヒライ is a deli located in 古賀市.

restaurants.name: Sukesan Udon (資さんうどん 古賀店)
restaurants.description: Sukesan Udon (資さんうどん 古賀店) is a udon restaurant located in 古賀市.

restaurants.name: Sukesan Udon (資さんうどん 新宮店)
restaurants.description: Sukesan Udon (資さんうどん 新宮店) is a udon restaurant located in 新宮町.

restaurants.name: IKEA Restaurant & Cafe (IKEAレストラン&カフェ)
restaurants.description: IKEA Restaurant & Cafe (IKEAレストラン&カフェ) is a restaurant located in 新宮町.
restaurants.address: 中央駅前2-9-1 (IKEA福岡新宮 2F), 新宮町, 福岡県, 811-0120

restaurants.name: リンガーハット 福岡古賀店
restaurants.description: リンガーハット 福岡古賀店 is a noodle restaurant located in 古賀市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fukuoka Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kita Kyushu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
